title: Dog Walker Thresh
body:
Found this through my league friend @Claire (Hi Claire!!!!). It's a Deviant Art post by @VegaColors. I keep throwing money at my screen, but nothing happens? 

http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/144/0/9/dog_walker_thresh_by_vegacolors-d7jlc3a.jpg


Check it y'all!!!

replies.body:
Ah, I see your problem. It's common, and really simple if you think about it.  
You mustn't throw money at *your screen*, throw it at IronStylus and Morello and Phreak instead! :D
Ok I tried this, and they just picked up my money and were like "You dropped this?" Must find new approach.
PUPPIES!!!!!!!! <3
Maybe if I throw more it'll work ez

i have to throw credit to the artist, since they seem to unfortunately not been mentioned. This was done by the amazing Vegacolors in Deviantart, who has done many fan skin concepts such as Harlequin Jinx and Soul Reaver Aatrox.

Check him out here!

[http://vegacolors.deviantart.com/gallery/]

EDIT: Check *her* out there, my apologies Vegacolors, I didn't know you were a lass! My bad!

Thank you! I was sent the link by Claire and it was just to the image, but its the coolest idea with art I've seen (besides the Aperture Vel'Koz - is that the same artist BTW)! I've updated the post to credit the artist.
I know who made this skin,it is summoner called Ze Ocelot.
Le Blanc as Cruella De Vile xDD
1. there's already a skin for that - Wicked LeBlanc so there should be a Dog Walker Thresh skin D:

Thanks Sherlock for that insightful information which everyone knows.

In this case, Le Blanc takes the role of Cruella De Ville (obviously because of the dog she has - it is the same dog as in the 101 dalmatians)

I thought this was one of the stupidest skin ideas ever on paper, but if we actually made Thresh look like he's walking Cerberus or something I could totally get behind this.  His lantern could be his dog literally carrying them to Thresh in his mouth.
Zero the dog.
This is hilarious and well done!
and those souls what thresh collect, should be dog treats....
I would definitely buy that skin lol
Ok, maybe it's just not enough money. Here I'll start throwing my wallet as well, maybe then it'll work.

This skin needs to be made, but some of the abilities would not go according to the skin, such as the ultimate, what could it be? It would only be hard to get some ideas, even though, the skin itself looks really cool and many would pay for a skin like this.
Plus, it would be awesome if it could interact with {{champion:75}} or {{champion:107}} or even {{champion:103}}, well, these are just ideas :P
Nasus /Warwick interaction fo sho. I could just hear him saying "Heel" at Nasus - that's some trouble right there, right?
The ult could be a dog cage perhaps? Or one of those doggy pens.
Riot, please look at it as a potential new skin. it looks awesome!

His passive souls would be doggie treats!

His Q would be a leash, duh,

His W would be a swarming mass of aborableness pushing people

His E and his ambient Lantern would be that cute purple puppy, yipping when in E form

His Ult would be a cage naturally! A little doggie cage for potty training!

Have you tried sliding your credit card between your numpad keys?


Welp, it didn't work... maybe if i throw gem encrusted gold...

It's really cool art, but honestly I'd like to see a serious Thresh skin that was good/thematic before seeing a "joke" skin like this one. I (and sooooo many others) don't really care for the Deep Terror Thresh skin, and Championship Thresh is only available via mystery gift luck unfortunately.

LeBlanc always struck me as a cat person, lol.

The Box should have the dog running circles inside the fence.
That is seriously the best skin i have ever seen in my entire life
This gave me an idea... Parrot keeper thresh
Roit plz, plzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplzplz
Can people who get hooked be polymorphed into puppies (or Kog'Maw)? and the box be a puppy pen? And oh my gosh if the lantern is a puppy now, they're playing fetch. Brilliant.

Riot Leona?

Wait a minute... I'm crazy!

nice Thresh skin though.
Vegacolors <3
I would buy it in a heartbeat.
yes
If this gets put in the game before Arclight Thresh.... Have any of you even seen that skin concept? It's the craziest looking skin there is. Arclight Thresh>Dog walker Thresh
bahahahahahahhahhahaha
I want this.

THOSE SOULS ARE SPECTRAL TENNIS BALLS! FETCH.

"Wretched mongrels get the leash!"
*gasp* DOGIE!!!! :3

I have no idea what to think of this
as an huge thresh player I love his whole creepy vibe from all his skins...but this, this changes everything!

{{summoner:3}} how can I handle this?

Well, fortunately for you its just fan art, so you're safe with the thing under the bed.  

I think it would do for Thresh what Surprise Party did for Fiddle. But that's just me. Also, i <3 dogs

I really do like this skin, and I agree with you on the party fid subject
I would buy this skin if it came out
I also did a skin for Vel'koz, a gentleman vel'koz skin
its not as good as yours by far (man I wish I had a wacom tablet) anyway you did some great work on this
I didn't create this! This was made by VegaColors on deviant art. I am not Vega. But I would LOVE to see your Gentleman Vel'Koz skin, so pls post!

ahhh okay, still here is the link to my skin

http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-skins/XKEoG25E-gentleman-velkoz-fan-consept-art-update
LOVE IT!
glad you do ^^
huehuehue
